    public abstract class BaseShieldComponent
extends GameEntity
    BaseShieldComponent.java

    Defines a base object for the Shield.

    Version:
    1.2 15/04/2015
    Author:
    Davide Teixeria

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime)
        Is responsible for recharging the shields.

        WARNING: In a next version, it will change shield colors depending on the active shield number, using updateShieldColor().

        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the time between Update calls. It is used to balance the framerate drop lag.

      • updateShieldColor

        private void updateShieldColor()
        Changes the shield color depending on the current activated shield number.

        WARNING: At this moment, this function isn't coloring the sprite.

      • getMaxShields

        public int getMaxShields()
        Returns:

      • disable

        public void disable()
